trans-unit.source: A binding terminal that represents the flow of data into and out of an activity.
In this example, a custom `Square` activity has an <xref:System.Activities.InOutArgument%601> of type <xref:System.Int32> named `N1`.
This argument is used to receive the value to be operated on and is also used to pass the result of the operation back out.
In the following example, the `Square` activity is hosted in a workflow.
A value is passed into the activity and the result is then displayed to the console window by a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.WriteLine> activity.
The data type of the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> class using default values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Activity`1"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Variable"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Variable`1"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> class using the specified expression.
The value of the argument.
Gets an <xref href="System.Activities.Activity`1"></xref> that represents the value of this <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
Initializes and returns a new <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> constructed using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Activity`1"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
The new argument.
Initializes and returns a new <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> constructed by using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Variable`1"></xref>.
The value of the argument.
The new argument.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityContext"></xref>.
The activity context that contains the value of the argument.
The value of the argument.
Gets the location of the value for the <xref href="System.Activities.InOutArgument`1"></xref>.
The activity context that contains the location of the argument value.
A reference to the location where the value of the argument is stored.
Sets the value of the argument using the specified value.
The current activity context.
The new value.
